name: Pinoy Hatdog
text:
@Maki:
*slaps self on forehead* True, true. I need to get my eyes checked. 😣
Anyways, if the unit is in really good condition, and you're ok with having a jailbroken iTouch, I guess it *might be ok*.
Though personally, I might pass since I'm biased against jailbreaking, and, 2nd gen iTouch' miss out on some nifty features of iOS4 (multitasking, custom wallpaper, and Bluetooth keyboard).
